Uses of Interface
gov.nasa.worldwind.cache.MemoryCache.CacheListener

  • Packages that use MemoryCache.CacheListener 
    Package Description
    gov.nasa.worldwind.cache  
    gov.nasa.worldwind.data
    This package provides classes for converting raw data sources into a form which can be used by standard WorldWind components, such as Layer and ElevationModel.

    • Uses of MemoryCache.CacheListener in gov.nasa.worldwind.cache

      Fields in gov.nasa.worldwind.cache with type parameters of type MemoryCache.CacheListener 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.util.concurrent.CopyOnWriteArrayList<MemoryCache.CacheListener> BasicMemoryCache.listeners 
      Methods in gov.nasa.worldwind.cache with parameters of type MemoryCache.CacheListener 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void MemoryCache.addCacheListener(MemoryCache.CacheListener listener)
      Adds a new cacheListener, which will be sent notification whenever an entry is removed from the cache.
      void BasicMemoryCache.addCacheListener(MemoryCache.CacheListener listener)
      Adds a cache listener, MemoryCache listeners are used to notify classes when an item is removed from the cache.
      void MemoryCache.removeCacheListener(MemoryCache.CacheListener listener)
      Removes a CacheListener, notifications of events will no longer be sent to this listener.
      void BasicMemoryCache.removeCacheListener(MemoryCache.CacheListener listener)
      Removes a cache listener, objects using this listener will no longer receive notification of cache events.

    • Uses of MemoryCache.CacheListener in gov.nasa.worldwind.data

      protected MemoryCache.CacheListener CachedDataRaster.cacheListener
